markdownRemark.html:
This post is more for me than anything. I have trouble remembering what command I use to start Jekyll on my MacBook.

This is NOT a tutorial on how to install Jekyll or how to use markdown. I simply need a reminder for myself ðŸ˜Š.

The command I use is: 

bundle exec jekyll serve

frontmatter.title: What Command Do I Use To Start the Jekyll Server
frontmatter.description: The command to use when starting Jekyll in the terminal.
